        public Semantic()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method retreives the vocabulary. The vocabulary provides the size of the term-context matrix and the index locations of all terms to other methods.
        Parameters:
        args - Accepts the commands , , , and optionally from the command line.

      • buildTermContextMatrix

        public static float[][] buildTermContextMatrix​(java.lang.String document,
                                               int window)
        This method uses a document to build a term-context matrix. It requires an ArrayList of strings arranged in alphabetic order (the vocabulary). It packs these terms into segments, which countTerms uses to count contextual terms. After the term-context matrix is complete, the method weightTerms calculate the PPMI for each value.
        Parameters:
        document - A document of tokens, with each listed on a single line.
        window - The window size for context.
        Returns:
        A complete term-context matrix.

      • getVocab

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getVocab​(java.lang.String filename)
        Pre-reads the file to obtain |V|. The vocab will be used to find the location of terms in the matrix. Uses a TreeMap to arrange distinct terms in alphabetic order, which are later copied into an ArrayList. The wordSearch method uses a binary search on the ArrayList to find an index for a given word.
        Parameters:
        filename - A document of tokens, with each listed on a single line.
        Returns:
        An array of terms arraned in alphabetic order.

      • countTerms

        public static void countTerms​(float[][] tcm,
                              int window,
                              java.lang.String[] prev,
                              java.lang.String[] next,
                              int[] sum)
        It uses two loops with variables and offset values to find the contextual terms for each word in the segment. It also finds the contextual terms that overlap between two separate segments.
        Parameters:
        tcm - A new term-context matrix.
        window - The window size for context.
        prev - The last segment created by buildTermContextMatrix.
        next - The newest segment created by builtTermContextMatrix.
        sum - An array to store aggregated frequencies.

      • wordSearch

        public static int wordSearch​(java.lang.String target)
        Use a binary search to find the reference to a column for a given term. This is an attempt to avoid using a HashMap to map Strings to indices. However, it takes logarithmic time rather than constant time. The method returns the index of the String as the column reference.
        Parameters:
        target - The desired term in the vocabulary.
        Returns:
        The index for a term in the term-context matrix.

      • weightTerms

        public static void weightTerms​(float[][] tcm,
                               int[] sum)
        Uses PPMI to weight all values in the term-context matrix.
        Parameters:
        tcm - A complete term-context matrix.
        sum - An array of aggregated frequencies from the term-context matrix.

      • getV

        public static double getV​(float a,
                          double b,
                          float c,
                          int d,
                          double e)
        Calculates cosine similarity, given two rows in the context-term matrix. This is written like the exact formula.
        Parameters:
        a - The numerator of the formula.
        b - The leftmost term in the denominator.
        d - The total frequencies of all entries in the term-context matrix.
        e - A pre-calculated value for the denominator of the rightmost term in the equation.
        Returns:
        The value PPMI.

      • getV2

        public static double getV2​(float a,
                           float b,
                           float c,
                           double e)
        Calculates cosine similarity, given two rows in the context-term matrix. This version was re-written to avoid extra division.
        Parameters:
        a - The numerator.
        b - The leftmost term in the denominator.
        c - The rightmost term in the denominator.
        e - A pre-calculated value for the denominator of the rightmost term in the equation.
        Returns:
        The value PPMI.

      • calculateSimilarity

        public static float calculateSimilarity​(float[][] tcm,
                                        int u,
                                        int v)
        Calculates cosine similarity, given two rows in the context-term matrix.
        Parameters:
        tcm - A complete term-context matrix.
        u - The word in question.
        v - A term in the vocabulary.
        Returns:
        The value cosine similarity.

      • getContext

        public static java.lang.String[] getContext​(float[][] tcm,
                                            int k,
                                            int u)
        Look through V, the rows of the tcm matrix, to find the contextual words. It assumes that the ith row in the tcm matrix represents the ith word in V, which is in alphabetic order. This method uses a priority queue to return the k most similiar words.
        Parameters:
        tcm - A complete term-context matrix.
        k - The number of desired context words.
        u - The word in question.
        Returns:
        A list of the top k context words.

      • printContextMatrix

        public static void printContextMatrix​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> vocab,
                                      float[][] matrix)
        Print the contents of the matrix to the console.

      • printSums

        public static void printSums​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> vocab,
                             float[][] tcm,
                             int[] sum)
        Print the contents of the sums array.
